title: Transformer-Based Personalized Information Technology Leadership Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic information technology knowledge and organizational management experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening information technology utilization competencies required in the digital transformation era, targeting corporate managers/leaders.

learning_goals: Within six months, learners complete three or more personalized IT solution design projects through individual learning pattern analysis.
Optimize learning paths using a transformer-based recommendation system to improve learning efficiency by over 25%.
Dynamically adjust weekly learning plans based on formative assessment data to maintain a goal achievement rate of over 90%.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
